Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires age verification for internet pornography websites
Summary: Requires age verification for internet pornography websites; imposes a $50,000 penalty per day for violations; provides exemptions for news organizations.
LawCode: Add ยง390-f, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring age verification for internet pornography websites
